 BaseData ()

Detailed Description

Base Data Class. Used to define equal data of forthcoming data structures.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

void BaseData::setFlowParameters ( const FlowParameters &  flow_params  ) 

Sets new flow parameters. Automatically checks if e.g. num_scales is meaningfull an in case of too much scales it is set to its possible max for the current image sizes.

unsigned int BaseData::setNumScales ( const size_t &  scales  ) 

Sets number of used scales to build the image pyramids.

Parameters:
scales Number of scales.
returns number of scales really used. Might change to a smaller number if given number of scales does not fit the current layout.
